Message:
Then, I became
The Witch of Malefic Bubbles.

To destroy this world,
all for Lucille.

“Look, Lucille...
Just a little more,
and the whole world will be...!”

Just then, a beam of light
made all of my bubbles
vanish in an instant.
What could have possibly—
“Nebra!”

This voice...
Lucille...?!

No way...
At the lake, you were...

“I heard your voice
in those bubbles, Nebra.
Everything is clear to me now.
I’m sorry...

Back then, I never knew
how much I hurt you...
when I left you behind.”

Lucille took my hand.
She’s...alive...
Is this...a dream...?

No...this is real.
I know it is,
because I could never
forget this warmth...!
The warmth...of my Lucille...!

“Let’s go home.
To where everyone’s waiting.”

Everyone...?
So, in the end, to you I’m just...

No, no...I can’t think like this...!
I can’t let you find out
how I really feel...!

“Nebra...
I want to know every part of you.

So tell me right here, right now—
the true feelings you’ve been
hiding all this time.”

The last thing I want to do
is tell you the truth...
But, when you look
at me like that,
I can’t hold the words
back anymore...!

“...I want you...
to look only at me...!
You’re everything to me,
Lucille...

My heart belongs to you alone,
yet you only have eyes
for everyone else...!”

“This is the real me...!
I’ve always been carrying this...
this ugliness inside of me...

That sweet girl you fell for...
doesn’t exist...!”

In that moment,
Lucille pulled me
into a tight embrace...
as though she were
accepting all of me...

“Thank you for telling me
how you really feel...
But, I could never hate you
for something like that.

Both the darkness hidden
in your heart, and the kindness
you show to others make you
who you are, Nebra.”

“Besides, the two of us
are one, remember?
Not feeling whole
without the other
is only natural.”

“Yes...!
I love all of you too,
Lucille...!”

My clouded bubbles popped,
and rays of light
shine down around us.

Light shining within
the darkness,
and shadows lurking
amongst the light...
That is my heart.

It doesn’t matter if every part
of me is pure or not.
There’s no need to live
in fear of my own darkness.

Because...I have someone who
loves the darkest parts of me
at my side...!
